objects.description: [UNC2452](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0118) used Rundll32 to execute payloads.(Citation: Microsoft - Customer Guidance on Recent Nation-State Cyber Attacks)(Citation: Microsoft Deep Dive Solorigate January 2021)
